channel.title: Chicago Insane Hong Kong on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Chicago Insane Hong Kong on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: My Trip
item.description: here is what I am going to do this winter: Chicago - New York - London - Belfast - Glasgow - London - Vienna - Zurich - Helsinki - Saint Petersburg - Moscow - Tel Aviv - Beijing - Xian - Guilin - Guangzhou (Canton) - Hong Kong - Xiamen - Shanghai - Seoul - Kagoshima - Tokyo - Seoul - Beijing - Xian - Chengdu - Kunming - Hanoi - Bangkok - Bali (Denpasar) - Adelaide - Hong Kong - Los Angeles - Miami - Rio de Janeiro - Los Angeles - Denver - Chicago that would be insane.
